mainText:
I just can't believe it. He was a genius.

I remember that when I had to prepare a presentation for university 
first time,  I used to watch his inspiring keynotes again and again. He 
presented the products in a way which made you simply convince. The connection between a company and a customer would have never been so 
close and emotional if there was no Steve Jobs.

He will always be remembered as one of the greatest personalities of 
this and last century.

Thanks for making our lives much happier, Steve.
author: Anonymous
